pageContext.claim: “According to the National Academy of Sciences, our current immigration system costs America’s taxpayers many billions of dollars a year.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump cherry-picks numbers from a lengthy and detailed report that used several different models of measuring the economic and fiscal impacts of immigrants, showing both the costs and benefits. The report found that first-generation immigrants incur costs to the government that are later balanced out by their descendants for a net positive to the U.S. economy.
